channel.title: Way to lock name changes?
channel.description:
I'm a streamer for TOL and it's just a matter of time before I come across someone who snipes and ruins the game for me and my team. I don't really care about the killing me part because it's what I expect to happen, but to throw the game for unseen/cult the few time I'm on there is pretty messed up. Anytime it happens I wait til large end of the game and I report the player, then I start the next game only to find he changed his name at the main lobby because it's free and can be done as many times as you like and I get sniped again.
On the latest patch notes i have not seen anything address this small thing and I understand because the balance of the game is super important. But if I can leave a game because I remember the name and dont want to play with that troll again would be a great QOL change.
It could be locked through gold or $ does not really matter as long as there is some oversight to people abusing this
